title: Course Following
extended_details: This project works to develop computer vision for navigation on a course. This project will guide a person through a course. Our two main methods will be positioning between lines and moving towards a pre-programed scene. We will be using OpenCV’s implementation of Hough Lines and Cascade Classifiers.
